title: ADMB
summary: ADMB or AD Model Builder is a free and open source software suite for non-linear statistical modeling.[3][4] It was created by David Fournier and now being developed by the ADMB Project, a creation of the non-profit ADMB Foundation. The "AD" in AD Model Builder refers to the automatic differentiation capabilities that come from the AUTODIF Library, a C++ language extension also created by David Fournier, which implements reverse mode automatic differentiation.[5] A related software package, ADMB-RE, provides additional support for modeling random effects.[6]
